classes.cCustomNote: One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B1, B2, Upper-Division B, C1, C2, Lower-Division C, Upper-Division C, D1, Upper-Division D, Lower-Division E, Lower-Division F, and GE Elective. Upper-Division B, Upper-Division C, and Upper-Division D should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Refer to the online catalog for GE course selection, United States Cultural Pluralism (USCP), and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR). The USCP requirement can be satisfied by some (but not all) courses within GE categories: Upper-Division B, C1, Upper-Division C, D1, Upper-Division D, or E.

classes.cCustomNote:
Choose one of the following: Minor Course OR SPAN 300-400 Level Course.

With department approval, any declared academic minor, plus 2-8 units of SPAN 300-400 level courses to reach 32 units. Minor and SPAN coursework used here may not double count with SPAN major core requirements or approved electives.
